p: Compound 241 was also tested for cytotoxicity against SH-SY5Y (human glioma cell lines), HeLa (cervical epithelial cells), HCT116 (human colon cancer cells), HepG2 (human hepatocellular carcinoma cells), A549 (human lung cancer cells), and MCF7 (human breast cancer cells). Compound 241 showed weak cytotoxic effects against HeLa cells with IC 50 value of 97.4 μM, while the positive control cisplatin showed IC 50 value of 21.1 µM [ 78].
